series.title: SE
series.disclaimer: Standard Features • 17" Alloy wheels • Manual air-conditioning • Front and rear electric windows • Cruise control • Mazda Multimedia System • Leather steering wheel and gear knob

series.title: SE-L
series.disclaimer: Standard Features as SE model plus: • Smart City Brake Support (SCBS) • Privacy glass • Dual-zone climate control air-conditioning • Front and rear parking sensors

series.title: Sport
series.disclaimer: Standard Features as SE-L model plus: • 19" Alloy wheels • Leather trim • Bose® sound system •Reversing camera • Smart keyless entry • Bi-Xenon headlights with AFS

option.title: Bi-Xenon headlights with Adaptive Front Lighting System (AFS)
Power folding, heated door mirrors with integrated indicator light
Heated door mirrors with integrated indicator light
Driver’s seat, reclining and height adjustment
Dynamic Stability Control (DSC) with Traction Control System (TCS)

accessories.title: Rear bumper step plate
accessories.description: Protects your rear bumper from scratching when loading and unloading the boot.
